Rogue

The Rogue API allows a Pintool writer to traverse the static control flow graph. It also allows the Pintool to dynamically generate traces in the Pintool. The generated traces are all placed in the code cache after the user chooses to compile the traces. Instructions in the original code can be patched to use the traces generated by the Pintool.

The entire Pin 2.0 api is available to Rogue.
